author: cnbc.com
title: Papa John’s Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Papa John’s International, Inc. (NASDAQ: PZZA) today announced that the Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.225 per common share, payable February 23, 2018, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 12, 2018. At this quarterly dividend rate, the annual dividend is equivalent to $0.90 per common share.
Forward-Looking Statements

Item 1A. - Risk Factors” of the Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 25, 2016. For more information about the Company, please visit www.papajohns.com .
